results.title: Simvastatin increases cell viability and suppresses the expression of cytokines and vascular endothelial growth factor in inflamed human dental pulp stem cells in vitro.
results.text_hl: However, a comprehensive understanding of how @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ affects the behavior of DPSCs and its potential in @<m>DISEASE_Pulpitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011671 @@@pulpitis@@@ is still lacking.
